summary: A gangster deputes two of his men to recover money from an out of town compulsive gambler.
cast: Kunal Khemu|Boman Irani|Soha Ali Khan|Cyrus Broacha|Simone Singh|Mahesh Manjrekar|Amit Mistry|Vinod Khanna|Sudesh Berry|Raja Kapse|Rajesh Kumar Singh|Divya Bhatnagar|Pooja Desai|John Doe|Raaj Gopal Iyer|Raj Gopal Iyer|Abhijit Lahiri|Sunil Mehta|Anupam Mittal|Pitobash|Rajeshwari|Harry Shobhnani|Prashant Thakkar|Sunil Upadhyay
